sentences.en: ‘I want to go home.’ ‘So do I.’
sentences.cn: “我想回家。” “我也是。”

sentences.en: ‘Will Kay come?’ ‘She may do.’
sentences.cn: “凯来吗？” “或许吧。”

sentences.en: ‘You forgot all about it.’ ‘No, I didn’t.’
sentences.cn: “你把这事忘记得一干二净。” “没有，我没忘记。”

sentences.en: “Don't morning me. Where the hell've you been all night?”.
sentences.cn: “别跟我说早安，你一晚上到底在哪？”。

sentences.en: "Steve, what do you want?" — "Coke, Pepsi, it doesn't matter."
sentences.cn: “史蒂夫，你要喝点什么？”——“可口可乐，百事，随便啦。”

sentences.en: "What do you mean?" I asked, offended on Liddie's behalf.
sentences.cn: “你什么意思啊？”我问，替利迪感到愤愤不平。

sentences.en: All he does is sit in front of the television all day.
sentences.cn: 他就整天坐在电视机前看电视。

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: bored teenagers with nothing to do
sentences.cn: 无所事事的无聊少年

sentences.en: By golly we can do something about it this time.
sentences.cn: 这次我们确实可以采取行动了。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: Do you sweat a lot or flush a lot?
sentences.cn: 你常出汗或是脸上常发烫吗？

sentences.en: Does she speak French?
sentences.cn: 她会说法语吗？

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: Have you done your homework yet?
sentences.cn: 你做完家庭作业了吗？

sentences.en: he did a Garbo after his flop in the play.
sentences.cn: 他表演失败后就模仿嘉宝。

sentences.en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
sentences.cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

sentences.en: I didn’t believe the story and neither did he.
sentences.cn: 我不相信这个故事，他也不信。

sentences.en: I didn’t know what to do.
sentences.cn: 我不知道该做什么。

sentences.en: I don't like fish.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢鱼。

sentences.en: I have no knowledge of the political dos and don'ts.
sentences.cn: 我对政治上的规矩一无所知。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: in such a society it is not done to admit to taking religion seriously.
sentences.cn: 在这样一个社会里承认很重视宗教是行不通的。

sentences.en: It’s a pleasure doing business with you.
sentences.cn: 很高兴跟你做生意。

sentences.en: it's my decision—it's nothing to do with you.
sentences.cn: 这是我的决定——不关你的事。

sentences.en: John's got nothing to do with that terrible murder.
sentences.cn: 约翰和那场可怕的谋杀没有任何关系。

sentences.en: look, just do one, will you!.
sentences.cn: 喂，你走开吧！。

sentences.en: Mark was condemned to do most of the work.
sentences.cn: 马克被迫承担大部分工作。

sentences.en: She'd do anything for a bit of pin money.
sentences.cn: 为了挣点外快，她什么都肯做。

sentences.en: So now you know as much as I do.
sentences.cn: 那么现在你知道的和我一样多了。

sentences.en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentences.cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: the problems are usually to do with family tension.
sentences.cn: 这些问题通常与家庭关系紧张有关。

sentences.en: they're doing well out of scrap metal.
sentences.cn: 他们正在靠废金属赚钱。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentences.en: You need to do more exercise.
sentences.cn: 你需要多锻炼。

words.tran_cn: 要求；规定；C大调音阶中的第一音

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（在举止行为上）模仿（某人）
服无期徒刑；多才多艺；包办一切

phrases.phrase: do one's head (或 nut in 或 do one's head)
phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)暴怒；极其担心；极其激动
整理；刷新；修缮；使精疲力尽
获得大量的…；有很多的…供应，得到…充足的供给
与（某人，某物）有多大关系
(英)[用于表示说话人认为某事与习俗、舆论或礼节相悖]不合适的，不可行的
凑合着用；以…权充；设法达成

trans.tran_cn: （用于实义动词前构成否定句和疑问句），（构成附加疑问句），（代替实义动词以避免重复）
trans.tran_en: used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used

trans.tran_cn: 要求；规定；C大调音阶中的第一音

trans.tran_en: used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used

trans.tran_cn: 做，干，进行（活动），从事（职业）
trans.tran_en: used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used
to perform an action or activity
to perform an action or activity
